title: Hallmark Card Deluxe DVD Studio (2011) [Multilenguaje]
description:
Hallmark Card Deluxe DVD Studio (2011) [Multilenguaje]

English:
--------
Category: Design Inage 
Operating system: Windows XP/Vista/7 
Interface: English 
Language: Multilanguage 
Format: ISO and / or Installer 
RAM: Minimum 256-Mb 

Hallmark Card Studio Deluxe - fast easy and fun to create unique cards for any occasion. The package includes advanced digital imaging! This is a huge graphics package that includes thousands of clip art and projects for creating greeting cards on any topic, and calendar invitations 3D photo frames licenses to projects of electronic charts and much more. 
For over 100 years razrabatyvaet Hallmark greeting card for holiday events. 
Hallmark Card Studio Deluxe 2011 continues this tradition, but in electronic format. This allows you to create a unique Hallmark cards as unique as the people that you care. 
With some simple steps you can add personal photos and images from clip art of your choice. You'll get exclusive access sources seal and access to sources of the system that eliminates dependence on the national system configuration. 

Requirements: 

* Operating System: Windows Vista XP or 7 
Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz or faster 
Memory: 512 MB of RAM 
* Optical Drive: DVD or CD 
* Monitor: 1024 x 768 screen with 16-bit color 
* Printer: Color Printer 

Content: 

1000 + Hallmark cards and other unique projects 
18,000 + premium images 
Directions 8000 
Exclusive Hallmark fonts 
Includes a photo editor. 
Treatment procedure: 
1. Save the image to a CD or run in a virtual CD-ROM 
2. From the menu select Install and run. 
3. They refuse to update and clear the update settings. 
4. Do not register! 
5. Work without restrictions
